chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 12 has the above problem: I would like to cancel the order and reissue. Thank you for your help,

Hello,

My product iPhone 12 has the above problem.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,

Dear ecomobile

Regards,

Dear Backcare,

The order has been cancelled upon the customer's request. Does the customer still want the refund or has he changed his mind?

Regards,

the customer would like a refund
